Posts.Content: Posted this earlier but not sure it went through. My husband was just diagnosed with prostate cancer. Don't have all his information but this is what I have: PSA: 5.9 Gleason score: 8 I was numb and feeling hopeless until I found this forum...THANK YOU ALL!
